title: Loading screen is black, names are black, health bar is black, spells are black.......
body: Can someone help with this. I can't see anything but black for these. I can't see champion health bars, names, my spells, the loading screen only shows the champion image everything else is black........

replies.body:
Glad I'm not the only one experiencing this.  loading screen is totally black except for champ portraits, in game, the health bars and names are all black and it makes team fights a miserable mess.  I've reported it with the bug tool multiple times.  It's getting very frustrating.  My screen will also randomly black out maybe once per game for about 3-4 seconds.  I'm tired of reporting and re-reporting it every time.  I'm temporarily boycotting spending money on riot points until this issue is resolved.  It's making the game really unenjoyable and your teammates never understand why I'm just standing still for a few seconds during a team fight.

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

my problem is that when i'm in the loading screen, everything is black except the summoner names and spells and icons, the black screen only goes away just as i'm getting into the game, please help me, someone XD thx.
@Porocles, I have a nagging suspicion that it has to do with the VS event that's going on right now... Is there any way to check on your side?

Thanks for the report on this!  There's been a few reports, and it may be an issue with a corrupt config.  Resetting your config should fix this up:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know if that does the trick!
